bilingual.source: What is the population of the world?
The population of Asia is much larger.
It has a population of over six million.
And China has the biggest population, too.
How fast is the world's population growing?
Shenzhen is larger in population than Beijing.

list.abstract: population,表示考察对象的全体。又称母体。总体中每个成员称为个体。

yingyinNormal.en: This is one way. Plan B, a population bomb.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个办法B计划，超级人口炸弹。

yingyinNormal.en: So Valentine's gonna take care of the population problem himself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是瓦伦丁打算自己解决人口问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Even today, still 25 percent of the world's population of 7 billion can't read, which is about 2 billion people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 甚至到今天，70亿人口当中，还有25%的人不识字，这大约是20亿人口。

yingyinNormal.en: Like us, they appear to have a population growth rate that's unsustainable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向我们一样，他们也有过度的人口增长。

yingyinNormal.en: Thirty-five years ago, this was a small town with a population of 300,000 people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 三十五年前，这里只是一个小镇，人口仅有三十万。

yingyinNormal.en: He also makes me wonder how our food machine will be able to keep up with our growing hungry population.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他也让我们思考我们的食品机器是如何跟上人口增长的步伐？

yingyinNormal.en: It's growing wealth and dynamism has created an incredible population explosion in an already expanding city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 日增的财富与活力造成了这个已然膨胀的城市惊人的人口激增。

yingyinNormal.en: With a population of over twelve million people, the French capital is at the heart of the Ile-de-France region.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拥有超过一千两百万人口，是法国的首都，位在法兰西岛的心脏地带。

yingyinNormal.en: He's a plague, Tony. He invades planets. He takes what he wants. He wipes out half the population. He sent Loki.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他就像瘟疫，托尼。他入侵星球。想拿什么就拿什么。抹去半数人口。当初是他派洛基来的。

yingyinNormal.en: By 2030, 350 million people, the population of the United States, are expected to move from the countryside to the cities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 到2030年，预计有三亿五千万人，相当于美国的人口总量，将会从农村迁移到城市。

yingyinNormal.en: These forces are using chemical weapons on their own people, torturing the opposition, and starving huge segments of the population.
yingyinNormal.zh: 政府军使用化学武器攻击自己的人民，折磨异议人士，让全国绝大多数人口忍饥挨饿。

yingyinNormal.en: World population, PC placements, the archive of all the medical literature, Moore's law, the old way of sequencing, and here's all the new stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界人口，PC配置，医学文献档案，摩尔定律，旧的测序方式，然后是这些新玩意。

yingyinNormal.en: Now look, as long as we continue to increase the population, we're going to have to continue to grow and eat genetically modified foods, and that's the only position that I'll take today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 随着人口不断增长，我们会不得不使用转基因产品，这是我的唯一立场。

yingyinNormal.en: If we do not reduce our population ourselves, there's only two ways it can go: The host kills the virus, or the virus kills the host. Either way…
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们不减少人口，就只有两种后果：宿主杀了病毒，或者病毒杀了宿主。两者之一……

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, if you friended every person on the site, you'd have 800 million friends. That's twice the population of the united states.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上,如果你把国内所有的人都加为好友的话，你就会有8亿多个朋友了，那可比美国人口总人数的两倍还要多。

yingyinNormal.en: It is predicted to the city's population will be 50 million by 2050, which means every New Year's Eve celebration in Beijing will just keep getting bigger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 根据预测，北京的城市人口到2050年会达到5000万，这意味着北京每年的除夕庆典会越来越盛大。

yingyinNormal.en: Hong Kong truly is a vertical city. Because of its geography, space is at a premium which means it has one of the highest population densities in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 香港的确是一个垂直城市。由于其地理条件，香港的空间十分宝贵，这意味着香港的人口密度在全球名列前茅。

yingyinNormal.en: First things first, we all know that China is a developing country, it has large population and it is really hard to manage, especially after world war 2, almost perished.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，地球人都知道，中国是一个发展中国家，她有着众多的人口，管理起来有很大的难度，尤其是在二战之后，中国可谓是废墟上重建起了家园。

yingyinNormal.en: Which suggests either a remarkable passivity among the, I assume, 24 to 36 residents of this building, based on the number of mailboxes and given typical urban population density or a shared delusion of functionality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就说明要么这楼的24到36户人家，我假设的，基于邮箱的个数和典型的城市人口密度得出的都特别懒散，要么都同时产生功能性错觉。

yingyinNormal.en: I think we have to be honest with ourselves. There was definitely a marketing element to it. I mean, he's a hometown guy. The area has a significant Asian-American population. And the way it played out. You know, people went bonkers for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说实话我们得对自己坦诚一些，签林书豪进来肯定是考虑到了市场因素。我的意思是说他是我们自己家乡人，这里有很大比重的亚裔人口。一切都证明了确实是那样的，湾区的球迷为他疯狂。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: all the people or animals of a particular type or group who live in one country, area, or place

examination_example.sentence: Female participation on corporate boards may not currently mirror the percentage of women in the general <highlight>population</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，女性在公司董事会中的比例可能无法反映女性在总人口中的比例。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>population</highlight> would be fitter, healthier and produce more winners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人口会越来越好，产生更多的赢家。

examination_example.sentence: USFWS also set an interim goal of restoring prairie chicken <highlight>populations</highlight> to an annual average of 67, 000 birds over the next 10 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: USFWS还设定了一个中期目标，即在未来10年内将草原鸡数量恢复到每年平均67000只。

word_usage.usage: population作名词，常与定冠词the连用，作主语用时，谓语动词常用第三人称单数形式，如：the population is...；当主语表示人口的百分之几、几分之几时，谓语动词用复数形式，如：80% of the population are...

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Those countries have swelling young <highlight>populations</highlight> of fast-growing fleet of cars and motorbikes and a limited supply of surgeons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些年轻人口迅速增加的国家有着快速增长的汽车和摩托车数量，而外科医生的供给却很有限。
贫困人口比率（占农村人口的百分比）。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 去动词化的抽象名词后缀, 表示"行为, 过程, 结果"

word_usage.usage:
表“人口, 全体居民”时，population既可用单数形式（视为整体），也可用复数形式（考虑个体）。
示例：The island has a population of about 78,000.
该岛人口约78,000。
人口的多少，须用large/small修饰，population不与数词/many/few等词连用。

打听人口数，可用“What”或“How large”提问，而不用“How many/much”。
示例：中国有多少人口？
正 What is the population of China?
正 How large is the population of China?

exam_freq_info.chinese: 人口; 人口总数; 动物数量

examination_example.sentence: Over-hunting could lead to the disappearance of the whale <highlight>population</highlight>, possibly causing major problems to the global food chain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过度捕猎可能会导致鲸鱼数量的减少，这可能会给全球食物链带来重大问题。

examination_example.sentence: That's big news because the whale <highlight>population</highlight> has been falling, and no baby whales were seen last year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个重大消息，因为鲸鱼数量一直在下降，去年没有看到幼鲸。

examination_example.sentence: The whale <highlight>population</highlight> has become endangered due to commercial whaling activities in recent years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，由于商业捕鲸活动，鲸鱼种群已濒临灭绝。

人口的多少，须用large/small修饰，population不与数词/many/few等词连用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 全体居民；人口；人口密度；居群；母体；特殊群体；移民活动；种群；总体；星族
adj. 有人口居住的:　a densely populated area 人口稠密的地区 | populated countries. 有人口居住的地区；安装有元件的

word_family.mean: v. 构成…的人口；使定居于；充满；出现于；输入

sense_info_list.en: all the people or animals of a particular type or group who live in one country, area, or place

examination_example.sentence: What was a cause of the waterfowl <highlight>population</highlight> decline in North America?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 北美水禽数量下降的原因是什么？

examination_example.sentence: After a serious flu outbreak wipes out 99.4% of the world's <highlight>population</highlight>, a battle unfolds between good and evil among those let.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一场严重的流感爆发，摧毁了世界上99.4%的人口，一场正义与邪恶的战争就此展开。

examination_example.sentence: Two years later, it was one of the largest cities in the West, with a <highlight>population</highlight> of 30,000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两年后，它成为西部最大的城市之一，人口为3万。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 去动词化的抽象名词后缀, 表示"行为, 过程, 结果"

word_usage.usage:
①说人口多少用large或small与之搭配，而不用many或much。但其前可加不定冠词表示“人口数目”：
The population of the US is much smaller than that of China.
美国人口比中国人口少多了。
②问“人口是多少”应用What's the population of...?或How many people are there...?而不用how many population 或how much population
③population侧重于某地人口的整体时，谓语用单数。指某地人口的一部分，侧重于每个个体时，谓语用复数：
At present about 30% of the Chinese population smoke.
目前大约30%的中国人吸烟。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 人口; 人口总数; 动物数量

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 老年人口；老化人口；老龄化人口

sense_info_list.en: all the people or animals of a particular type or group who live in one country, area, or place
sense_info_list.zh: 人口; 人口总数; 动物数量

examination_example.sentence: This was because China had 22 percent of the world's <highlight>population</highlight>, but only 7 percent of its farmland.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为中国拥有世界22%的人口，但耕地却只占世界的7%。

examination_example.sentence: Now the <highlight>population</highlight> of the United Kingdom has increased to sixty-five million.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，英国的人口已增至六千五百万。

examination_example.sentence: There are 56 ethnic (民族的) groups in China, including the Han people who make up 90% of the total <highlight>population</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国有56个民族，其中汉族占总人口的90%。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 去动词化的抽象名词后缀, 表示"行为, 过程, 结果"

word_usage.usage:
表“人口, 全体居民”时，population既可用单数形式（视为整体），也可用复数形式（考虑个体）。
示例：The island has a population of about 78,000.
该岛人口约78,000。
人口的多少，须用large/small修饰，population不与数词/many/few等词连用。

打听人口数，可用“What”或“How large”提问，而不用“How many/much”。
示例：中国有多少人口？
正 What is the population of China?
正 How large is the population of China?
